cinimaticCaption.caption: CUTTER: Hard starboard!
SERINA: Hard starboard, aye!
SERINA: Captain! They are charging weapons!
CUTTER: Battle stations! Bring weapons online.
Tell Forge he's not done out there yet.
SERINA: Alerting the Sergeant - aye sir.
SERINA: So...am I the only one freaked out by the fact
we're inside the planet?
